headline: Honeywell announcement suggests faster break-up timeline, says Citi
summary: Citi views Honeywell’s (HON) decision to continue to explore strategic portfolio actions as inline with CEO Vimal Kapur’s ongoing portfolio simplification and realignment initiatives and likely accelerating the company’s value creation over time. The firm thinks “pure-play” aerospace and automation focused companies could garner a better valuation multiple over time as they establish themselves. headline: My Dividend Stock Portfolio: New November Dividend Record - 97 Holdings With 18 Buys
summary: Financial writer achieves record dividend income in November through investments in BDCs, inching closer to $10,000 annual goal.
